AE5B62204B1FB18FD103519F4F38C337: If set, this clapboard will only send a signal if the stream hitting its timestamp is the stream specified.
15CAFDE0497C42D493DB10828B7326A0: Sends a signal when the currently playing video reaches a defined timestamp.
EE6F8DDD48E31DD985B5C6A458134926: Sends signals when the playing stream reaches a point in its playback.
F577B6BA4C36A5FB1AE322A9284D0EFE: Sets the timer on the clapboard to count down to 0 or up to it's set time.
FF2400934566662794B5DB97A137A842: When this device's timer elapses, transmit a signal on this channel.

UserOptionDefinition.Creative_Device_StreamClapBoard_C.Disabl: Disables the device on receiving a signal from the selected channel.
UserOptionDefinition.Creative_Device_StreamClapBoard_C.Enable: Enables the device on receiving a signal from the selected channel.
UserOptionDefinition.Creative_Device_StreamClapBoard_C.Time R: When this device's timer elapses, transmit a signal on this channel.
